    /**
     * @event my.test.event
     *   
     * Determines file changes between the specified build and the previous build.
     *
     * Will return an array of added, modified and removed files.
	*
     * @since v1.1.2
     * @param boolean $myParam This is my first param.
     * @param string|integer $previous This is my second multi-line param,
     *  it stretches on two lines.
	*
     */
